pr_title: fix: respect PDML timeout when using streaming RPC

timeline.message: fix: respect PDML timeout when using streaming RPC
fix: check for negative or zero deadline

timeline.bodyText: nit: would it be hard to inject the Stopwatch instead? Not a big deal, just wondering if we could use composition here. Disregard if it would be too hard to inject.
timeline.author: thiagotnunes

timeline.message: fix: subtract from original timeout to get remaining
